description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Evaluation, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2021 efforts were made jointly with UNHCR, IOM, among other UN agencies and NGOs to monitor the needs of families on the move. UNICEF Ecuador carried out three national telephone surveys (January, May and October) to gather solid evidence for use in advocacy for the needs of children and their families in Ecuador. Internal close monitoring has implemented some key programme interventions. To prepare for the development of the new country programme, a situation analysis and country programme evaluation have started. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:18/01/2022

actual.value: 2021:3 ENCOVID surveys, effects of the strategy in Imbabura, outflow evaluation contribution, one joint needs assessment, SitAn and CPE started
